com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.Rule

  • public final class Rule
extends Object
    A class representing a rule. It includes a list of including conditions, a list of excluding conditions and a list of actions

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rule

        public Rule(String direction,
            String description,
            boolean disabled,
            boolean defaultCase)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which to apply the rule. Defaults to DIRECTION_BOTH.
        description - description
        disabled - whether the rule is initially disabled
        defaultCase - whether this rule is a default rule

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public RuleStatus apply(IFIXMessage message)
                 throws Exception
        Apply the rule to the specified FIX message.
        Parameters:
        message - The FIX message.
        Returns:
        RuleStatus
        Throws:
        Exception - On erroneous rule application.
        See Also:
        RuleStatus

      • isSatisfied

        public boolean isSatisfied(IFIXMessage message)
                    throws Exception
        Tests if the conditions of a rule are satisfied. All including conditions should be true and none of the excluding conditions should be true
        Parameters:
        message - Message that the rule should be applied to
        Returns:
        true/false
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs when evaluation a condition
